name: Perfect Universe - Play with Gravity
description: Perfect Universe is a collection of 9 gravity inspired games. Featuring 6 hilarious local multiplayer modes and over 70 eye-popping single player levels, this captivating universe has something for everyone.
minimum_requirements: Mínimo: SO: Windows XP Procesador: Intel Dual core / AMD Athlon 64 2.0 GHz or above Memoria: 2 GB de RAM DirectX: Versión 10 Almacenamiento: 268 MB de espacio disponible
recommended_requirements: Recomendado: SO: Windows 7 Procesador: Intel Core i3 / AMD Athlon II 2.4 GHz or above Memoria: 4 GB de RAM DirectX: Versión 10 Almacenamiento: 268 MB de espacio disponible Notas adicionales: PC Game Pad (1 to 4)

reviews.review_text: Love this game. Its fresh, fun and has a great graphic style. The local multiplayer party mode is a great bonus. Definitely recommend.
